title: Patch Notes
content: ing hirelings or avatars via dialogue now functions the same way as dismissing companions. When Withers resurrects an avatar, the Dream Guardian will no longer immediately prompt another nearby avatar to loot them for a tadpole. Similarly, dead, dismissed avatars will no longer trigger this same prompt. Some decorum, please. When multiple characters in the party discover a trap or hidden item, only one will comment on it.
